hero.heading: Insurance Verification
hero.text: Learn about our insurance coverage options for addiction and mental health treatment

contactHero.description: Starting your recovery journey can seem daunting, especially when considering the financial aspects. At ClearPath, we're committed to removing barriers to treatment by working with most major insurance providers. Our dedicated team will verify your insurance benefits and explain your coverage options for addiction and mental health treatment. We believe everyone deserves access to quality care without financial stress.
contactHero.bottomDescription: Don't see your provider listed? Contact us to discuss other options. We're here to help you find a path to recovery that works for your situation.
contactHero.formSubtitle: Complete the form below, and our admissions team will contact you promptly with your coverage details.
contactHero.privacyNotice: Your information is confidential and protected by HIPAA regulations. We respect your privacy and will only use this information to verify your insurance benefits.

insuranceProviders.heading: Insurance Companies We Work With
insuranceProviders.subheading: ClearPath partners with numerous insurance providers to ensure you receive the coverage you deserve for your recovery journey. Our team will help you navigate your insurance benefits.
insuranceProviders.footerText: Don't see your insurance provider listed? We work with many more companies and plans. Contact our team to verify your specific coverage.

providers.name: Blue Cross Blue Shield
providers.description: Coverage for mental health and substance abuse treatment

list.name: Veronica L.
list.text: Clearpath gave me the strength to overcome my anxiety. The compassionate therapists provided unwavering support, and I've found a renewed sense of purpose andtranquility in my life.

list.name: Pushpender Singh
list.text: Clearpath helped me regain control of my life. The personalized treatment plan and the caring staff made all the difference. I am now on a path to recovery and happiness.

cta.heading: Begin Your Recovery Journey Today
cta.text: Our admissions team is available 24/7 to answer your questions and guide you through the insurance verification process.

insuranceVerification.description: Our insurance verification process is designed to be quick and straightforward. We understand that seeking treatment is a significant decision, and we're here to make at least one part of that process easier.

features.text: Most verifications are completed within 24 hours
Your information is completely confidential and protected
No obligation to proceed with treatment after verification
We advocate for maximum coverage on your behalf

cta.heading: Need Immediate Assistance?
cta.subheading: Our admissions team is available 24/7 to help you verify your insurance benefits right now.
